author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Tuticorin Central police filed cases against actor Simbu and music composer Anirudh on Sunday.

Inspector of Police D. Rhenius Jesupatham said the case had been filed under Sections 509 of the IPC (word, gesture or act intended to insult the modesty of a woman) and Section 67 of the Information Act based on a local court’s direction.

Tuticorin Judicial Magistrate – II, Kamaraj, on December 28 last issued orders to Tuticorin Central police to inquire into the matter and submit a report in a case filed against Simbu and Anirudh within March 7.

Sakthikani, a woman lawyer, filed a petition before Judicial Magistrate here on December 21 last seeking action against the two.
title: Cases filed against Simbu, Anirudh
